CreativeWorkSeason.name: actor
CreativeWorkSeason.desc: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

CreativeWorkSeason.name: partOfSeries
CreativeWorkSeason.desc: The series to which this episode or season belongs.

CreativeWorkSeason.name: numberOfEpisodes
CreativeWorkSeason.desc: The number of episodes in this season or series.

CreativeWorkSeason.name: trailer
CreativeWorkSeason.desc: The trailer of a movie or tv/radio series, season, episode, etc.

CreativeWorkSeason.name: endDate
CreativeWorkSeason.desc: The end date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).

CreativeWorkSeason.name: episodes
CreativeWorkSeason.desc: An episode of a TV/radio series or season.

CreativeWorkSeason.name: startDate
CreativeWorkSeason.desc: The start date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).

CreativeWorkSeason.name: director
CreativeWorkSeason.desc: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video gaming etc. content, or of an event. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

CreativeWorkSeason.name: productionCompany
CreativeWorkSeason.desc: The production company or studio responsible for the item e.g. series, video game, episode etc.

CreativeWorkSeason.name: episode
CreativeWorkSeason.desc: An episode of a tv, radio or game media within a series or season.

CreativeWorkSeason.name: seasonNumber
CreativeWorkSeason.desc: Position of the season within an ordered group of seasons.
